categories.title: Oil painting
categories.description: Explore the rich textures and vibrant colors of oil painting, perfect for creating timeless masterpieces.

categories.title: Mosaics
categories.description: Discover the intricate art of mosaics, combining tiny pieces of glass or stone to form stunning designs.

categories.title: Art of light
categories.description: Delve into the mesmerizing world of light art, where illumination and shadows create captivating visual effects.

categories.title: Watercolor
categories.description: Learn the delicate techniques of watercolor painting, where soft hues and fluid brushstrokes capture the essence of your subject.

categories.title: Guitar
categories.description: Master the art of guitar playing, from classical to contemporary, and express your creativity through music.
